verses.name: Psalms 106:10
verses.text: And he saved them from the hand of him that hated them, and redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.

verses.name: Psalms 106:11
verses.text: And the waters covered their enemies: there was not one of them left.

verses.name: Psalms 106:12
verses.text: Then believed they his words; they sang his praise.

verses.name: Psalms 106:13
verses.text: They soon forgat his works; they waited not for his counsel:

verses.name: Psalms 106:14
verses.text: But lusted exceedingly in the wilderness, and tempted God in the desert.

verses.name: Psalms 106:15
verses.text: And he gave them their request; but sent leanness into their soul.

verses.name: Psalms 106:16
verses.text: They envied Moses also in the camp, and Aaron the saint of the Lord.
